data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Botryllus (Ascidiacea) from the Red Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shenkar, Noa, Monniot, Françoise (2006): A new species of the genus Botryllus (Ascidiacea) from the Red Sea. Zootaxa 1256: 11-19, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173083
